http://photos1.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/8/8/5/6/event_255694902.jpegBio from the yoga teacher, Jahnava Sundari

My name is Jahnava Sundari (Diana). I am half Indian, half Italian. 
I started my yoga practice in 2006 in London at the age of 18. Since then I have been
constantly practicing and living in different ashrams in Europe, India and the US. In 2011, I got my 200h Yoga Teacher Training Course in Vijnasa and Prenatal yoga in Hrishikesh, India. Ever since then I have taught in India, Belgium, London and Italy. I have also taught few workshops in Belgium, Italy, New York and Atlanta. In these workshops I presented Yoga and Ayurveda, Yoga Dance, Mantra Vijnasa and Chakra Yoga. My main style of teaching is Vijnasa yoga because it helps my creativity to flow in the sequences and
helps the student to experience the internal energy with a new perception. I have been practicing meditation since 2004 and thus meditation becomes an essential element in my classes. These meditations are normally guided visualization, which help to deal with the deeper emotional stages of the practitioner. I also use mantra meditation with the aid of Indian traditional instruments such as the Harmonium and Mridanga. I have learnt music and mantras in West Bengal (India) in 2000, while I was taking a course in Bhakti Sastri, knowledge of the Vedas, from where the Yoga tradition comes from. In 2001 I started
studying ancient Theology in Belgium and I have done many researches on the Yoga tradition. My final dissertation was about how to integrate Yoga and Bhakti. I have given various lectures in Belgium, Italy, London and Atlanta. I have also studied Ayurveda from a doctor for 3 months while travelling with her and translating her seminars from Spanish to Italian and English. I organized her seminars in Italy, Croatia and Hungary. Since then my passion for studying Ayurveda developed and in 2012 I got my certificates in Ayurvedic massage and Panchakarma therapy, Ayurvedic pregnancy care with baby massage, and Yoga therapy (100h) in Kerela (South India).  In 2012 I got training in Atma yoga in Dallas for 500h, but I still have to complete the online course. In the same year I also got a Vaisnava teacher training course in Belgium which is meant for any kinds of teaching purposes.
Email: [masked]
Phone num:[masked]

name: Yoga in the Park!!!
how_to_find_us: we will meet under the big arch where the carriot with th horses are. We will meet at 7 pm and start the class within 10 min.

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description: The weather seems to be very favorable for yoga in the park. You are all invited for another thematic yoga class in the park Cinquantanaire. we will meet at 7pm under the big arch, under the horses. The class will explore a specific them every time and we will practice some breathing exercises, meditation and asanas. Looking forward to see you. Lots of love!!!!
name: Yoga in the Park!!!

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
http://photos4.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/1/c/9/0/event_260407312.jpegFESTIVAL D'ETE 2013

Samedi 27 et dimanche 28 juillet, à partir de 11 heures se tiendra l'événement le plus important du calendrier annuel de Radhadesh

Venez découvrir la culture indienne avec des artistes professionnels du théâtre, de la danse et de la musique. http://vimeo.com/44540023

Practice le yoga, le meditation et les mantras avec un professeur de Bhakti yoga.


Divers stands vous permettront d’acquérir
l'un ou l'autre parfum exotique, ou
"la" belle pierre semi précieuse, etc ...

Ou, tout simplement, venez découvrir
la philosophie indienne et la médecine ayurvédique.

Une aire de jeux permettra aux enfants de s'amuser et de se faire grimer.

L’entrée payante de 7.50 € par adulte et de
3.50 € par enfant de 6 a 12 ans comprend
tous les spectacles, la visite guidée du château,
un savoureux repas végétarien indien.

Pour plus d'informations:[masked]

 

http://www.decouvertedesoi.net/fecircte-deacuteteacute.html

 

http://www.radhadesh.com

description:
Hi everyone!!!

Ready to start with regular yoga classes?

The yoga classes I teach are normally thematic, which means I develop a theme throught the class in order to realize it in our daily life. Wednesday we will explore how to reduce stress through yoga. We will practice Vijnasa Yoga, pranayama and mantra chanting.

looking forward to see you!

big hug and lots of love!!!
how_to_find_us: It is a small center, near park Cinquantanaire. 04 86 377206 is my phone num.
name: Yoga and Pranayama

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
When Yoga, Ayurveda and essential oils meet, there is a wonderful alchemy.
Yoga opens and energizes the physical body, Ayurveda helps us to realize our unique and personal nature, and essential oils strengthens our body and purifies our mind.
During the class we gradually move forward in our energy centers, from the lower to the higher chakras, with the help of music and mantras.
Come and experience your spiritual nature. Feel your soul in all its strength and create a radiant atmosphere within in yourself.

TIP: For those who wish they can take a meals from 1.30 pm - 2.30 pm,
for the small fee of 5 €
name: Yogaroma

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
This festival is in honor of the auspicious appearance day of Lord Krishna.

The devotees in Radhadesh will celebrate this auspicious event and invite you all to join. The last two years we even registered over 3000 pilgrims on site during D-day, and for 2013 we hope to even do better. The festival is free of cost and there is a sumptuous meal and quality entertainment for the pleasure of all.

Programme

Darshan : 10-19h in temple room with opportunity for dipa daan (offering of candle)

Swinging of Chhota Krishna: 11-16h with pushpanjali (offering of flowers)

Darshan, Questions & answers: H. H. Krishna Mangala Swami from India

Free veg meals: 12-18h continues serving of prasadam (offered foodstuffs)

Stage program (tentative) hosted by Brahma:

12.30h: Mirage (Mohnish Sharma)
13.00h: Odissi Dance: Chareita Smit
13.20h: Welcome address & speeches by a.o. Ambassador of Nepal
13.30h: Narsing Balwantsing & Jimmy Ramphalmisser (Baithak gana)
14.15h: Siddharta & ensemble (classical music)
15.00h: H.H. Krishna Mangala Swami from India
15.30h: Berry Damrie
16.10h: Samadhi Dance Company
16.30h: Leo de Kruis & Madhu Lalbahadoersing

For any questions regarding the Janmastami festival please email Manu: [masked]
name: Janmastami Celebration 2013

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

We will practice Yoga according to Ayurveda and Ayurvedic massage. You will learn Abhyanga (body massage), Siroabhyanga (head and shoulder massage) and mukhabhyanga (face massage).
Ayurveda is an ancient science of well-being which complements the yoga practice. if you need more info for the program you can write to me on: [masked]

« Nous apprendrons aussi des exercices de respiration qui vont énergiser et équilibrer notre corps et notre esprit et pour finir, nous explorerons aussi les méditations par la visualisation. »

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
Quand le yoga, l’ayurvéda et les huiles essentielles se rencontrent, il se produit une alchimie magnifique.

Venez expérimenter l'approche d'une partie plus profonde de votre nature spirituelle.

Venez ressentir votre âme dans toute sa force et créer une atmosphère rayonnante en vous-même et pour notre environnement.

Le yoga peut ouvrir et dynamiser le corps physique, l'ayurvéda peut nous aider à prendre conscience de notre nature unique et personnelle,
et les huiles essentielles serviront non seulement au renforcement de nos corps énergétiques, mais aussi à la purification de notre esprit.

Nous progresserons dans nos centres énergétiques, à partir des chakras inférieurs vers les supérieurs, en s'aidant de la musique et des mantras, et cela au fil des week-ends suivants,
de 15 à 20 heures :

Le week-end du 14 et 15 septembre, nous finirons avec les chakras : ajna et sahasrara

Vous êtes tous les bienvenus !!!!!!!!

La participation est de 25 euros par séance
(pause avec collation comprise).

Il est bien entendu que chacun peut assister à l'un ou l'autre de ces ateliers sans pour autant participer à la totalité. Pour tout renseignement, vous pouvez appeler notre contact : Anandini au 0487/[masked]

Pour ceux qui le souhaitent, venez partager notre repas prévu de 13 h 30 à 14 h 30, pour une petite participation de 5 €.

name: Bhajans and Kirtan (Sacred Mantras from India)

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
Uw workshop Hugelkultur vindt plaats in het hart van de Belgische Ardennen op het landgoed van Radhadesh. De workshoplocatie wordt omgeven door prachtige tuinen en is pal naast kasteel van Petite Somme gesitueerd, een schilderachtig kasteel in de Ourthe vallei.
In deze setting:
- neemt u deel aan interactieve theorie sessies
- verzamelt u uw basismateriaal m.b.v. ossenkracht
- maakt u uw eigen woodcore bed
- verkent u het kasteel van Petite Somme onder begeleiding van een gids

U sluit de workshop af met een permacultuur wandeling over het 47 hectare landgoed van Radhadesh.

WANNEER: Vrijdag 25 – Zondag 27 Oktober 2013
WAAR: Radhadesh, Rue de petite somme 5, 6940 Septon – Durbuy
TAAL: Nederlands
INSTAPNIVEAU: Er is geen basiskennis vereist, slechts uw wens om te leren.
VERZOEK: neem uw regenjas en laarzen mee. Alle overige benodigde materialen worden door Radhadesh aangeleverd.
DOCENTE: Bhagavati devi dasi

PAKKETPRIJZEN: Accommodatie, vegetarische maaltijden & lesgeld:
Pakket 1: E 150,- All-In o.b.v. dormitory
Pakket 2: E 166,- All-In o.b.v. gedeelde kamer met privé badkamer
Pakket 3: E 130,- Lesgeld en de vegetarische maaltijden

Bezoek onze site voor meer informatie; http://radhadeshblog.wordpress.com/new-events/hugelkultur/
name: Hugelkultur: maak je eigen woodcore bed

description:
VENDREDI 6 DECEMBRE DE 19h30 À 21h00

SAMEDI 7 DECEMBRE DE 19h00 À 21h00

DIMANCHE 8 DECEMBRE DE 11h00 À 13h30

Qu’est ce qui fait de nous des humains? Comment sommes-nous arrivés ici? Quel est le sens de la vie? Nous faisons tant d’efforts...Comment pouvons-nous trouver la paix? Où trouver les réponses à nos questions? Nous nous sentons seuls avec nos incertitudes, perdus 

Gaura Bhakta, avec ses talents de conteur, pourra nous éclairer grâce à ses connaissances de la Bhagavad Gita et du Bhakti Yoga.

http://www.decouvertedesoi.net/cours-de-bhagavad-gita.html

PAF: LIBRE ET COLLATION OFFERTE

Info: http://www.decouvertedesoi.net/weekend-de-bhakti-yoga.html 

Veronique[masked]

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
1er février et 1er  mars    


de 10h00 à 13h30 et de 15h00 à 18h00.repas végétarien prevu à 13h30

Deux séances de yoga comprenant asanas, pranayama et

initiation au mantra, méditation et relaxation guidée.

Un schéma de leçon sera remis à tous les participants pour  permettre a chacun de pratiquer à domicile en toute simplicité.

Approche et étude des aphorismes de Patanjali: 

Les yogas sutras figurent parmi les textes du hatha yoga les plus influents. Leurs 185 axiomes condensés exposent les moyens pratiques pour réaliser l'union avec Le Divin en empruntant un chemin qui comprend huit "branches "ou observances. 

Chacun aura le loisir d'explorer l'expression de soi dans l'écriture libre et spontanée.

Apporter : de quoi écrire, une couverture et des vêtements confortables pour la pratique. 

Le prix de l'atelier s'élève à 35 euros (repas inclus)

www.devouvertedesoi.net

Autobiographie d'Ananta 


Pratiquante du yoga depuis 1982, formée à la transmission du yoga:  viniyoga (Krishnamacharya -Madras).

ratique l'écriture cursive et l'expression artistique (peinture, sculpture  et chant indien )

1982          Initiation à la pratique du viniyoga avec D Haidon,B                         Chowelka et E Dohmen. 

1999  Initiation au yoga tibétain avec Lama Zeupa

2008 Formation à  l'enseigement du viniyoga (lignée                               Krishnamacharya -Chenai) avec  F Moors et E Dohmen.

Formation permanente avec E Dohmen.

1993  pratique le raga du nord de l'Inde et le nada Yoga avec Pandit  A Pattak et D Schell, et plus.  

Le chant du monde avec B Cholewka,le chant védique avec S Moors,et le chant carnatique avec Ramamani au karataka collège of percussion (Bangalore -Inde) 

Initiation au chant des bauls avec G Das et au dhrupad avec Nimai nitai das.

Inscriptions: Veronique:[masked] ou [masked]

.

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
Mantra means a sacred utterance, numinous sound, or a syllable, word, phonemes, or group of words believed to have psychological and spiritual power. Mantra may or may not be syntactic nor have literal meaning; the spiritual value of mantra comes when it is audible, visible or present in thought.

Everyone is invited to spend evening singing different mantras for the pleaseure of our inner self.

Yoga is music
name: Immerse yourself in living sound! Saturday 18.30

description: Vegetarian food is no longer the challenging option that it used to be – now it's easy being green. Creating exciting vegetarian recipes is a breeze, and if you need more inspiration these specially selected vegetarian cookery courses will help. This Friday we will learn few recepies according raw food diet. Starting at 5 p.m. suggested donation 5 euro
name: Vegetarian Cooking course on Friday in Bhakti yoga center in Brussels!

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

name: Yoga retreat! Relax your body - inspire your heart

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
Le hatha yoga, basé sur la respiration, combine différentes techniques telles que les étirements, les postures, la méditation, la relaxation et la connaissance yogique. 
La pratique régulière de ce yoga amène à une vie plus saine et plus heureuse.

La répétition d'un mantra médité est, non seulement un puissant moyen d'entrer dans le silence de l'esprit, mais aussi une opportunité de créer une vibration mentale qui permet à l'esprit de faire l'expérience de niveaux plus profonds de la conscience.

yoga et mantras
name: Hatha Yoga avec Ananta et méditation à l'aide des mantras avec Anandini

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
Special guests Sarvatma das and Divya dasi from california coming to Brussels to share with us all the best raw cakes recepies and to speak about healthy life and thinking. Join us to cook, to eat and to laught!


price - 15 euro
name: Special cooking class - raw, vegan cakes!

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
Do you know how very simply you could make cheese at home? We will show you on September 3rd (Wednesday) 19.30 in center de bhakti yoga! Later from this cheese we will make wonderful sweets with saffron, nice snacks and one more vegetable preparation. Join us!

Suggested donation 15 euro
name: Vegetarian cooking class! Home made cheese day!

name: Vegan cooking class! Make choco-mousse!

group.name: Brussels mantra yoga pranayama meditation meetup

description:
Vaiyasaki prabhu kirtan tonight in Centre de bhakti yoga! Starts at 18.30!

I've been traveling the world presenting Kirtan Rasa in the tradition of Sri Chaitanya Mahaprabhu. I am an initiated disciple of His Divine Grace A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami who introduced Krishna Kirtan to the western world in 1965 in New York City. During the next 12 years he circled the globe introducing Kirtan and Vedic culture in fulfillment of an ancient prophesy that Krishna Kirtan would spread to every town and village of the world. By His grace I have dedicated the last 40 years of my life to this sacred tradition. My wife, Kaisori, and I spend 6 months of the year touring all over India and Asia doing Kirtan events, and giving discourses on Bhakti-yoga. The other 6 months we are usually on tour throughout many European countries, and the Americas. You can also catch me on tour in your area. With love,
Vaiyasaki Das...
name: Mantra music evening!
